徵.definition: 4th note in the ancient Chinese pentatonic scale 五音[wu3yin1], corresponding to sol

徵信.definition: to examine the reliability; reliable; credit reporting

徵傳.definition: narrative of long journey; campaign record

徵兆.definition: omen; sign (that sth is about to happen); warning sign

徵友.definition: to seek new friends through personal ads, dating apps etc

徵召.definition: to enlist; to draft; to conscript; to appoint to an official position

徵名責實.definition: to seek out the real nature based on the name (idiom); to judge sth at face value

徵文.definition: to solicit articles, essays or pieces of literature (on a subject or in commemoration of an event)

徵求.definition: to solicit; to seek; to request (opinions, feedback etc); to petition

徵聘.definition: to invite job applications; to recruit

徵詢.definition: to consult; to solicit the opinion of

徵調.definition: to conscript; to second (personnel); to requisition (supplies etc)

徵選.definition: to call for entries and select the best; to solicit (entries, submissions, applications etc); to select (the best candidate); contest; competition
